definition: back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: I think I'll participate in the triathlon with my old, one-speed bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 我想用平時賣東西時用的自行車去參加鐵人三項賽。

sentences.english: Exp: I hear you're a triathlete now?
sentences.chinese: 我聽說妳是“鐵人三項”的一份子了？

sentences.english: A triathlete's stride is critical to his or her running performance.
sentences.chinese: 鐵人三項的步伐對於他或她的跑步成績至關重要。

sentences.english: Hawaii challenges the fittest to survive its Ironman triathlon.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷邀請最合適的選手參賽，以保存其鐵人三項賽。

sentences.english: My goal this year is to complete an Olympic-distance triathlon.
sentences.chinese: 我今年的目標是完成一次奧運會距離的鐵人三項。

sentences.english: Triathlons are hard because you have to perform back-to-back events.
sentences.chinese: 鐵人三項很困難，因爲選手要進行連續的項目。

sentences.english: Shanghai Triathlon Club reserves all rights on the explanation of this brochure.
sentences.chinese: 本規程解釋權歸上海鐵人三項運動俱樂部所有。

sentences.english: There are very few people that I can talk to about running or the triathlons.
sentences.chinese: 因爲能跟我談跑步或鐵人三項的人實在不多。

sentences.english: You said you're a triathlon player.
sentences.chinese: 你說你是一名鐵人三項運動員。

sentences.english: I thellonk I'll participate in the triathlon with my old, one-speed bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 我想用平時賣東西時用的腳踏車去到場鐵人三項賽。

sentences.english: SIG is now the vice - President a Korean triathlon association.
sentences.chinese: 他是副總裁鐵人三項聯合會。

sentences.english: He has personally participated in various triathlons and climbed Yushan.
sentences.chinese: 自己也曾多次嘗試鐵人三項與攀登玉山。

sentences.english: I run and have finally run a marathon (two actually) and completed a triathlon.
sentences.chinese: 我開始長跑並且跑完兩次馬拉松了並且完成鐵人三項。

sentences.english: Word is the triathlete wants to run it.
sentences.chinese: 據說這名鐵人三項選手想要跑馬拉松。

definition: National Games, Chinese athletics competition, organized every four years since 1959
Ever Victorious Army (1860-1864), Qing dynasty army equipped and trained jointly with Europeans and used esp. against the Taiping rebels
to dress up and make up (like an actor)
sporting event/item on program of sports competition
organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
to snatch gold/to take first place in a competition
Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
